title: Vegetation Fire Threshold Classification
text: fiRetools R package version FireTools vegetation fire status tool. Using vector data fire history, vegetation type look-table fire attributes (Maximum/Minimum burn intervals), can produce maps vegetation status, well timeseries analyses area within class, associated landscape metrics.

what: Create template and region of interest (ROI) rasters in an output directory based on input vector ROI, resolution and projection. — createDomain
title: Create template and region of interest (ROI) rasters in an output directory based on input vector ROI, resolution and projection. — createDomain
text: Create template region interest (ROI) rasters output directory based input vector ROI, resolution projection.

title: Create template and region of interest (ROI) rasters in an output directory based on input vector ROI, resolution and projection. — createDomain
code: createDomain(   domain,   res = 100,   proj = NULL,   outdir,   quiet = TRUE,   overwrite = TRUE )

title: Create template and region of interest (ROI) rasters in an output directory based on input vector ROI, resolution and projection. — createDomain
text: domain SpatVect SimpleFeatures object contianing domain analysis.  contains multiple features, aggregated. res Resolution, project units, output template mask rasters. Defaults 100. proj Projection (CRS) object template mask rasters produced, epsg string eg. "epsg:3308". none provided, use projection input domain. outdir Output directory write rasters quiet Write progress diagnostics (TRUE/FALSE) overwrite Overwrite files (TRUE/FALSE)

title: Create template and region of interest (ROI) rasters in an output directory based on input vector ROI, resolution and projection. — createDomain
Create template and region of interest (ROI) rasters in an output directory based on input vector ROI, resolution and projection. — createDomain
code: library(terra) #> terra 1.5.34 data("ROI") ROI <- vect(ROI) test <- createDomain(ROI, res=50, outdir="../test",quiet=FALSE) #> [1] "No projection provided, using projection from input domain." #> [1] "Projection is: epsg:28355" #> [1] "Aggregating domain polygons into single polygon." #> [1] "Creating template raster." #> [1] "Raster extent: ext(522572.294629247, 524872.294629247, 5246758.06171584, 5249658.06171584)" #> [1] "Raster resolution: 50 x 50" #> [1] "Raster size: 46 x 58" #> [1] "Masking template by domain." #> [1] "Writing template." #> [1] "Writing mask" #> [1] "Writing vector ROI" plot(test$mask)

what: Process input fire history vector data to produce yearly history rasters — processFire
title: Process input fire history vector data to produce yearly history rasters — processFire
text: Process input fire history vector data produce yearly history rasters

title: Process input fire history vector data to produce yearly history rasters — processFire
code: processFire(   outdir,   fire_history,   season_field,   start_year = NULL,   end_year = NULL,   quiet = TRUE )

title: Process input fire history vector data to produce yearly history rasters — processFire
text: outdir Directory output fire history, must contains files produced createDomain fire_history SpatVect SimpleFeatures object contianing fire history polygons. Must contain field fire date four-digit year. season_field Name field SpatVect containing year/season fire start_year Optional, start year history calculation. Years excluded. end_year Optional end year history production. Years excluded. year beyond end year history, empty future projection rasters produced. quiet Print progress information

title: Process input fire history vector data to produce yearly history rasters — processFire
Process input fire history vector data to produce yearly history rasters — processFire

title: Process Vegetation polygon data to classified rasters — processVeg
text: Process Vegetation polygon data classified rasters

title: Process Vegetation polygon data to classified rasters — processVeg
code: processVeg(   outdir,   veg_polygon,   veg_LUT,   join_field,   min_field = "MIN",   max_field = "MAX",   form_field = NULL,   quiet = TRUE )

title: Process Vegetation polygon data to classified rasters — processVeg
text: outdir Directory output vegetation maps, must contains files produced createDomain veg_polygon SpatVect SimpleFeatures object containing vegetation map. Must contain field unique vegetation ID. veg_LUT Tibble data.frame containing look-table linking veg ID MAX MIN intervals join_field Name fo field joining veg_polygon veg_LUT min_field Field name look-table containing minimum interval years max_field Field name look-table containing maximum interval years form_field (Optional) Field name look-table containing broad vegetation formation group summarise results within. quiet Verbose logging

title: Process Vegetation polygon data to classified rasters — processVeg
